channel.description:
Forum: * Online: 24/7 !! Download Link ; [URL=http://uppit.com/v/3468HZAH]http://uppit.com/v/3468HZAH[/URL] (NEW CLIENT WITH SPIRIT SHIELDS) Friendly owner and admins! Still looking for MODs
- edge home - Fun Event everyday! - wildy levels - edge , varrock , mb pk - ancient magic ( working on lunar only the useless lunar spells work ) - pestcontrol with monsters , and alot of more nice mini-games - real barrows - d claws , d plate - zuriel set - statius set - barrows warspear - custom ranks - training on monsters - working prayer - new style of traveling ( gnome glider ftw :P ) - working bones on pray for more exp - all godswords with working specs. - Donator systems - Quests [ for free and dontators ] - Donator zone + staff zone - Donators ticker ( in-game ) - fixed DragonFire Shield - Godwars ( working sara kills then enter cave to kill bandos general )
